name: Curse of the Abyss
description:
A group university project about an abandoned city deep in the abyss. Solving puzzles clears the path and lets the player explore the remains of a civilazation.

I designed the level and the puzzles in this project. The game was in development for 4 months.

Controls:

Move = WASD

Sprint = LeftShift

Turn Mirrors = Q / E

Interact = F
